item.title: Centos7安装mysql 5.7
item.author: Laphael
item.description: 开放3306端口 1 2 3 firewall-cmd --state firewall-cmd --zone=public --add-port=3306/tcp --permanent firewall-cmd --reload 下载mysql官方repo源并安装 1 2 3 wget http://dev.mysql.com/get/mysql57-community-release-el7-8.noarch.rpm yum localinstall mysql57-community-release-el7-8.noarch.rpm -y 导入mysql repo源的GPG-KEY 1 rpm --import https://repo.mysql.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-mysql-2022 安
